entry.title: AnimatorLOD Pro - Animator Optimizer
entry.content:
Enhance Unity's animator performance with the AnimatorLOD Pro – a powerful tool designed to optimize animation playback and boost your application's overall efficiency.

Supercharge your game's performance with AnimatorLOD Pro, the ultimate tool for optimizing Unity's Animator system without compromising animation quality!


What does it do?

Using smart, distance-based frame skipping and skin-weight changing techniques, AnimatorLOD Pro ensures that animations close to the camera run smoothly while distant ones use less processing power. This results in smoother gameplay and a significant performance boost. perfect for scenes with many skinned mesh renderers!


What is included?

  • Improves performance with distance-based animation framerate scaling
  • Automatically adjusts skin weights based on distance to optimize quality
  • Easy to integrate components with documentation and video guide
  • Fully multithreaded skinning and Animator calculations—no impact on the main thread
  • Scales perfectly with all framerates
  • Seamlessly integrates with Unity's rendering pipelines (BiRP, URP, HDRP)
  • Supports all platforms, including AR, VR, Android, PC, WebGL, and consoles

This technique is already being used by many top-tier game studios, and now it's available to you!



Getting started is a breeze!

Just follow these steps:

  1. Add the AnimatorLODManager component to your scene.
  2. Attach the AnimatorLODObject component to your animated objects.
  3. Watch your animation performance improve instantly!

Need help?

Join our community or read the quickstart guide to get up and running!

entry.title: AnimatorLOD Pro - Animator Optimizer
entry.content:
提高 Unity 动画器性能的 AnimatorLOD Pro 是一种强大的工具，设计用于优化动画播放并提高应用程序的整体效率。

介绍 AnimatorLOD Pro，你提高 Unity 动画器性能的必备工具！

同时运行多个动画器可能会显著降低速度，但是使用 AnimatorLOD Pro，你可以提高性能而不会牺牲感知质量！

包含内容：

  • 易于集成
  • 在运行时更改动画帧率和皮肤权重
  • 皮肤处理保持多线程并可以在 GPU 上运行
  • 适用于所有动画器
  • 更新动画器时不会暂停主线程
  • 编辑器性能更佳的程序集定义支持

工作原理： AnimatorLOD Pro 使用一种智能的基于距离的帧跳过和皮肤权重调整技术。这种技术可以保留靠近摄像机的动画器的完整质量，而减少远处动画器的质量。这意味着靠近你的动画将会顺畅地运行，而远处的动画将会使用较少的处理能力，从而提供你所需要的性能提升。

这种技术已经被许多一流的游戏工作室所使用，现在它也为你所提供！

开始使用很容易！ 将 AnimatorLODManager 组件添加到你的场景中，将 AnimatorLODObject 组件附加到你的动画对象，并观察性能的即时提高！尤其是在包含许多皮肤网格渲染器的场景中。
